196331.en:
Yay! You're the first one to get on the train, you're the big rookie ! You're really on top of
the game!
196331.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>「イエーイッ！　イチバン乗りだなんて
　さっすが　大物ルーキー　<pc>さん！
　マジ　パネェっすわ～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196331.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>: 예~이! 제일 먼저 도착하다니
　역시 대형 루키 <pc> 씨!
　진짜 대박이네요~!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196331.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>耶！居然是第一个到达，
不愧是大型新人<pc>！
真了不起～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196331.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>耶！居然是第一個到達，
不愧是大型新人<pc>！
真了不起～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196332.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>That's weird, isn't it? Nothing's
happening.<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196332.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「……しっかし　ヘンだなぁ？
　何も　起こらないな。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196332.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: ……그런데 이상하네?
　왜 아무 일도 안 생기지?<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196332.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>……不过，真是怪了。
什么都没发生啊。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196332.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>……不過，真是怪了。
什麼都沒發生耶。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196333.ja: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「ほよよ～？　雨……？<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196333.ko: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 어어~? 비……?<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196333.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>哦呀～？下雨了？<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196333.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>哎呀呀～？下雨了……？<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196334.en: <start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Haha~ I see your point~!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196334.ja: <start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「はっは～ん　そーゆーことね～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196334.ko: <start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 아하~ 그런 거였군~!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196334.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>哈哈，原来是这么回事啊～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196334.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>哈哈，原來是這麼回事啊～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196335.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Hey, guys~ A little rain is coming!
Get out of here!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196335.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「おい　みんな～　ひと雨降るぞ！
　どっかに　避難しろ～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196335.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 한바탕 쏟아질 거야!
　어디로 피하자~!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196335.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>喂，各位～下雨咯！
先去找个地方避雨咯～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196335.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>喂，各位～下雨囉！
先去找個地方避雨吧～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196336.en:
Suddenly it began to rain heavily and
<pc> they took temporary
shelter!
196336.ja:
突然　はげしい雨が　降りはじめ
<pc>たちは　一時的に　避難した！
196336.ko:
갑자기 거센 비가 쏟아져
<pc> 일행은 잠시 대피했다!
196336.zh-Hans:
突然下起了大雨，
<pc>等人暂时避雨去了！
196336.zh-Hant:
突然下起了大雨，
<pc>等人暫時避雨去了！

196337.en: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>The rain seems to have stopped.<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196337.ja: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「雨は　あがったようだけど……。<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196337.ko: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 비는 그친 것 같은데…….<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196337.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>雨倒是停了……<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196337.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>雨似乎是停了……<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196338.en: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>Ooooooh! That one!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196338.ja: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>「ウオオオッ！！　あれは！！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196338.ko: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>: 우오오오!! 저건!!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196338.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>呜噢噢噢！！那是？！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196338.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔！！那是！！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196339.ja: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「わぁ～～！　キレ～～！！<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196339.ko: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 우와~~! 예쁘다~~!!<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196339.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>哇啊～～！好漂亮～～！！<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196339.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>哇啊～～！好漂亮～～！！<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196340.en: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001> I love it! Rainbowooooooooo!<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196340.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>「フーーッ　アメーージング！
　イタ映えェ　レインボゥーーーッ！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196340.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>: 휴우~~ 어메이~~징!
　게시판 감성 레인보~~우!!<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196340.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>呼——令人惊异！
晒照美景原来是彩虹——！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196340.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>呼──真是太驚人了！
曬照美景彩虹────！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196341.en:
We gadabout played with them, and Cumaulus was so enraptured that he sprinkled cloud particles, which rose
into the sky, and suddenly it started raining heavily.
196341.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「遊び人のオレらが　あそぶをキメたから
　ギズモがうっとりして　雲のカケラをまいて……
　それが空にのぼり　急に激しい雨が降ったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196341.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 놀이꾼인 우리가 놀기를 성공시키자
　넋이 나간 기즈모가 구름 조각을 뿌렸고……
　그게 하늘로 올라가 소나기가 쏟아진 거야.<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196341.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>身为玩乐者的我们只要对云雾怪
用了玩乐就会使其陷入陶醉……
由此散出的云碎片升上天空形成急雨。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196341.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>我們玩樂者只要施展「玩樂」，
雲霧怪就會陶醉地撒出雲碎片……
當那些雲碎片升上天空，就會突然降下大雨。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196342.en:
And just like that, the rainbow arch appeared just like this... The fantastic view that gadabout had been
talking about was for real!
196342.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「そんで　ちょうどよく　こうして虹のアーチが
　出現したんだな～。遊び人の間でウワサされてた
　幻のイタ映え絶景は　マジだったってワケだ！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196342.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 그래서 이런 무지개 다리가 나타난 거지~
　놀이꾼들 사이에 소문으로만 돌던
　환상의 게시판 감성 절경은 진짜였어!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196342.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>因此就刚好出现了这种彩虹拱门～
也就是说，玩乐者之间
流传的梦幻晒照美景是真实存在的！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196342.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>然後就會像這樣出現彩虹拱門～
也就是說，在玩樂者之間
流傳的夢幻曬照美景是真實存在的！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196343.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Oops! This can't be happening! Hey,
guys! You know what you have to do as
a gadabout, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196343.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「おっと！　こうしちゃいられねーぞ！
　おい　みんな～！　遊び人として
　やんなきゃいけないことは　わかってんな！？<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196343.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 이런! 이러고 있을 때가 아냐!
　이봐, 다들~! 놀이꾼으로서
　뭘 해야 할진 알고 있겠지!?<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196343.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>哦呀！可不能再继续发呆了！
喂，各位～！身为玩乐者必须要做的事情，
你们都明白吧？！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196343.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>喔喔！可不能再繼續發呆了！
喂，各位～！身為玩樂者必須要做的事情，
你們都明白吧！？<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196344.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001><pc> I ordered Frizz! Come
on, hurry up, hurry up!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196344.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「<pc>っちは　カメラを頼んだぜ！
　さあ　いそげ　いそげ～っ！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196344.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: <pc>치는 카메라를 부탁해!
　자, 어서! 서둘러!!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196344.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>拜托<pc>亲来照相了！
好啦，动作快些！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196344.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>拜託<pc>來照相了！
好啦，動作加快～！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196345.ja: <pc>は　シャッターを切った！

196346.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Yes! You got it! I'll trust
<pc>'s skill!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196346.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「よっしゃ！　撮れたか！
　<pc>っちの　ウデを信じよう！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196346.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 잘 찍었지!?
　<pc>치의 실력을 믿겠어!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196346.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>好耶！拍到了吧！
我相信<pc>亲的拍照技术！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196346.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>好耶！拍到了嗎！
我們就相信<pc>的拍照技術吧！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196347.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Well, gadabout work ain't over yet!
We're only playing until we get home!
So let's meet again at Gadabode!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196347.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「さーて　遊び人の仕事は　まだ終わってねーぞ！
　お家に帰るまでが　遊びだぜ～！
　つーワケで　遊びハウスに再集合で　シクヨロ！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196347.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 하지만 놀이꾼이 할 일은 아직 끝나지 않았어!
　집에 돌아갈 때까지가 놀이라고~! 그런고로
　놀이 하우스에서 다시 모이자, 알았지!?<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196347.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>好啦，玩乐者的工作可还没结束哦！
直到回家之前都算玩乐～！
所以，全体再到游乐屋集合！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196347.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>好啦，玩樂者的工作可還沒結束喔！
直到回家之前都算玩樂～！
所以，全體再到遊樂屋集合！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196348.en: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>Y~y! I'm so happy!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196348.ja: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>「イエ～イ！　アゲアゲじゃないっすか～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196348.ko: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>: 예~이! 대박인데요~!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196348.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>耶！还真是气氛高涨啊～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196348.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>耶！還真是氣氛高漲啊～！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196349.en:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>It's true~ Nice! I like the way it's
taken! <pc> Nice work!
You're so good at this!<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196349.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「ホントだ～　いいね！　なカンジに撮れてる～！
　<pc>ちゃん　さっすがぁ！
　イタ映えハント　上手だね～♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196349.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 그러게~ 좋아요!가 폭발할 것 같은 느낌이야~!
　역시, {pc}|hpp(이야,야)!
　완전 게시판 감성 저격수네~♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196349.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>就是说啊～这拍得连我都想直接点赞了～！
不愧是<pc>啊！
抓拍晒照美图水平一流～！<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196349.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>就是說啊～這拍得連我都想直接點讚了～！
不愧是<pc>啊！
拍曬照美圖水準一流～♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196350.en: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>Hooooaaa! It's dinaa~ t~immmm!<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196350.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>「フーーーア！！
　イッツ　ディナァ～　タ～イムッ！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196350.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>: 호~~~우!!

196350.zh-Hans:

到晚餐时间了！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196350.zh-Hant:

到晚餐時間了！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196351.en: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>Thank you for your hospitality!<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196351.ja: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>「ゴチにィ～　なりまァ～ッす！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196351.ko: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>: 잘 먹겠~습니다~!!<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196351.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>承蒙款待！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196351.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>承蒙款待～！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196352.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>I see! <pc> is the first time
for you to watch Paisen's dinner time,
right?<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196352.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「そか！　<pc>っちは　パイセンの
　ディナータイム見んの　はじめてだっけな。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196352.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 아! <pc>치는 선배의
　디너 타임은 처음 보겠네.<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196352.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>对了！<pc>亲这还是
头一次见到辈前的晚餐时间吧。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196352.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>對喔！<pc>這還是
頭一次見到輩前的晚餐時間吧。<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196353.en:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>Paisen has a great feature that allows
you to beam a photo true to the board!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196353.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「パイセンは　こうして　ビームを当てることで
　写真をスキャンして　掲示板にアップできる
　スッゲー機能を　持ってんのさ！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196353.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 선배는 이렇게 빔을 쏴서
　사진을 스캔해 게시판에 올리는
　엄청난 기능이 있어!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196353.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>辈前有个很厉害的功能，
只要这样用光线照射照片，
就能将其扫描并上传到公告板！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196353.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>輩前有個很厲害的功能，
只要這樣用光線照射照片，
就能將其掃描並上傳到布告欄！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196354.en:
The word on the gadabouts is that Paisen is thus taking the playful spirit of the Shatrue and running with
it as fuel!
196354.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「遊び人たちのウワサじゃ　パイセンは
　こうして　写真にやどった　遊び心を取り込んで
　それを燃料にして　動いてるっつー話だぜ！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196354.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 놀이꾼들의 소문에 따르면 선배는
　사진에 깃든 놀이꾼의 마음을 흡수해
　그걸 연료로 움직인다고 해!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196354.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>玩乐者之间有传言说，辈前就是这样
读取寄宿在照片上的玩乐心
作为燃料而行动的！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196354.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>玩樂者之間有傳言說，輩前就是這樣
讀取寄宿在照片上的玩樂心，
再以這些作為燃料而行動的！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196355.en:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>Paisen is a gadabout for a very long
time.......<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196355.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「パイセンはね～　ずいぶん昔から　遊び人を
　やってるみたいでね～　あたしたちにとっては
　遊び人の大センパイ……だから　パイセンなの♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196355.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 선배는 말이야~ 오래전부터 놀이꾼을
　하고 있다나 봐~ 우리한텐 놀이꾼 대선배지……
　그래서 선배라고 부르는 거고♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196355.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>辈前啊～
似乎在很久很久以前就开始当玩乐者了～
算是我们这些玩乐者的大前辈……所以叫辈前♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196355.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>輩前啊～
似乎在很久很久以前就開始當玩樂者了～
算是我們這些玩樂者的大前輩……所以叫輩前♪<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196356.en:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>But no one knew who Paisen was. I
didn't even know he was in the Aso
Club.<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196356.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>「だけど　パイセンが　いったい何者なのかは
　誰も　知らなくてね～……。
　あそクラにも　いつの間にか　混ざってたの～。<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196356.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>: 하지만 선배의 정체는 아무도 몰라…….
　놀클에도 어느새 끼어 있더라니까~<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196356.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>但是啊，辈前的真正身份究竟是什么，
这一点谁都不知道……
也不知道什么时候进的玩乐俱乐部～<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196356.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05498 _normal m00001>但是輩前究竟是什麼人，
這一點沒人知道……
不知不覺間就已經成了玩樂部的一分子～<stop_lip_animation n05498 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196357.en:
Coo~~! Paisen is also such a mysterious character! Seriously, they're amazing! That's Paisen for
you!
196357.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>「クゥ～～ッ！　そんな　ミステリアスなとこも
　パイセンってば　やべぇ～っすわ～！
　マジ　パネェっす！　さっすが　パイセン！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196357.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>: 크으~~! 그런 수수께끼 같은 구석도
　선배의 매력이죠~!
　진짜 대박입니다! 역시 선배예요!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196357.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>哈！还有这么神秘的设定啊，
辈前有种危险的感觉哦～！
真了不起！不愧是辈前！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196357.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>哈～～！輩前也真是的，就連這種
神祕的設定都好驚人～！
真了不起！不愧是輩前！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196359.ja: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>「バイブスゥ～……<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196360.ja: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>「アガって　キタァーーーッ！！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196360.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>高涨起来了——！！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196360.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05499 _normal m00001>高漲起來了────！！！<stop_lip_animation n05499 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196361.en: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>Hugh! It seems to be very popular!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196361.ja: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>「ヒューッ！　けっこー好評みたいっすね！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196361.ko: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>: 휴우~! 반응이 뜨거운가 보네요!<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196361.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>耶！看来评价相当不错呢！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196361.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n05497 _normal m00001>咻──！看來評價相當不錯呢！<stop_lip_animation n05497 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196362.en:
When you upload a photo and get a ''like'' on it...! When a photo is uploaded, the heart part of the photo
lights up! I guess it was perfection this time!
196362.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「アップした写真に　いいね！　がつくとさ～
　ああして　ハートんとこが　ピカピカ光るんだ！
　今回は　大成功だったっぽいな！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196362.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 업로드한 사진에 좋아요!가 많아지면~
　저렇게 하트가 반짝반짝 빛나!
　이번엔 대성공인 것 같네!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196362.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>上传的照片如果获得了点赞的话，
就会像那样在心脏部位闪闪发光！
这次看来也获得大成功了！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196362.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>上傳的照片如果獲得了點讚，
就會像那樣在心臟部位閃閃發光！
這次看來非常成功呢！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196363.en:

196363.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>「つー感じで　これが　遊び人の仕事ってワケよ。

　これ　おひねりの分け前ね。おつかれっした！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196363.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 이게 바로 놀이꾼의 일이야.
　<pc>치, 잘했어!
　이건 네 몫의 수익이야. 수고했어!<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196363.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>就是这样，这就是玩乐者的工作。
<pc>亲干得很不错！
这是属于你的打赏部分，辛苦啦！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196363.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>就是這樣，這就是玩樂者的工作。
<pc>做得很不錯喔！
這是屬於你的分紅，辛苦啦！<stop_lip_animation n05496 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196364.ja:

196364.ko:
<start_lip_sync n05496 _normal m00001>: 좋아! <pc>치의 놀이는
　이제부터가 진짜 시작이야! 앞으로
